\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H5975"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* provision, \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w own|strong="H6440"\w* meat, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w which|strong="H4960"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w drank|strong="H4960"\w* \w himself|strong="H1431"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* being nourished \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, afterwards \w they|strong="H3117"\w* might \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* among \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, Ananias, Misael, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Azarias.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* purposed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H1351"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* table, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w drank|strong="H4960"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* requested \w the|strong="H0834"\w* master \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H1351"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8269"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Malasar, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, Ananias, Misael, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* Azarias:

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3117"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w tried|strong="H5254"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
